title: French city logo
content:
### Formatting Error
The formatting code **png\_alreadyuploaded\_t** does not exist or cannot be used in this context.
author: ponofob

comments.content:
i have problems with uploading files but anyway :   
The french city of Saint-ï¿½tienne, where i'm journalist in the local paper for the summer, has changed its logo, from that :   
http://www.forez-info.com/photo/image\_agrandir.php?id\_image=196   
to that :   
http://www.forez-info.com/photo/image\_agrandir.php?id\_image=368

http://www.forez-info.com/photo/image\_agrandir.php?id\_image=367   
What do you typophiles think about it ?
